description: This file is a test specification for the Angular AppComponent, containing unit tests to verify component creation, title property, and rendering behavior.

classes.name: AppComponent
classes.description: The main application component being tested.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Asynchronous setup to configure the testing module with AppComponent.

methods.name: it('should create the app')
methods.description: Test to verify the application component is created successfully.

methods.name: it(`should have the 'angular' title`)
methods.description: Test to verify that the component's title property equals 'angular'.

methods.name: it('should render title')
methods.description: Test to verify that the component renders 'Hello, angular' within an h1 element.
